title: Update sign-in screen logo to uploaded JPEG

requirements.summary: Add the uploaded JPEG as the only login/sign-in logo static asset under generated assets (square, not distorted).
acceptanceCriteria: A new static asset exists under frontend/public/assets/generated derived from WhatsApp-Image-2020-10-24-at-11.11.10-PM-2.jpeg and is suitable for use as a logo (square/contained, not distorted).
No UI on the login/sign-in screen references the old login image asset anymore (e.g., /assets/generated/auth-image.dim_512x512.jpeg is no longer used on that screen).

file_operations.description: Create a square-cropped (512x512) logo image derived from the uploaded WhatsApp-Image-2020-10-24-at-11.11.10-PM-2.jpeg, ensuring it is not stretched or distorted and is suitable for the sign-in card logo.

requirements.summary: Update AuthGate unauthenticated UI to use the uploaded logo image and a generic English alt text.
acceptanceCriteria: When logged out (no identity), the logo shown above the title in the sign-in card is the uploaded image.
The alt text is in English and is generic (e.g., "Login logo"), and does not contain a real personâ€™s name.
The sign-in page renders without broken image links in both local and deployed builds.

file_operations.description: Replace the current unauthenticated logo source with /assets/generated/login-logo.dim_512x512.jpeg and update the alt text to a generic English description (e.g., "Login logo"); ensure the previous /assets/generated/auth-image.dim_512x512.jpeg is no longer referenced in this login/sign-in UI.
